name: One Mum
description:
Oh no! You're lost in a supermarket. Try and find your mum, and walk up to her.

There is only one mum that looks like you!

Entry for Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2019

Ryan Watkins - Art/Code

Ryan Fawcett - Code/Music

Install Instructions
  • Download and extract the .zip file
  • Run the "One Mum.exe" file
Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement

Enter/Space - Menu selection
